error_login: An error occurred while trying to log you in.
error_registration: An error occurred when we tried to register you.
error_resetPassword: An error occurred when we tried to reset your password.
error_updateUser: An error occurred when we tried to update the information about you as a user.
error_changePassword: An error occurred while changing your password.
error_fetchProfile: An error occurred while getting your profile data.
error_fetchActivePlan: An error occurred while getting the informatino about your current plan.
error_createSubscription: An error occurred when we tried to create your subscription.
error_fetchTeam: An error occurred when we tried to get the information about the team.
error_fetchContestRef: An error occurred when we tried to get the inforamtion about the contest.
error_fetchContestRequest: An error occurred when we tried to get the pending request to join this contest.
error_fetchContestStatementSummaryRef: An error occurred when we tried to get the final results
error_updatingContestRole: An error occurred when we tried to change the role of the user.
error_updatingContestStatement: Error occured during updating contest statement.
error_fetchEvent: An error occurred when we tried to get the details of this event.
error_featuredEvent: An error occurred when we tried to get the events featured to you.
error_fetchEvents: An error occurred when we tried to get the details of your events.
error_addEvent: An error occurred while we tried to add the event.
error_addEventImage: An error occurred when we tried to add the event image.
error_attendEvent: An error occurred when we tried to let you attend the event.
error_myTeam: An error occurred when we tried to get the details about the team.
error_invitingTeam: An error occurred when we tried to invite the user to the team.
error_addTeamImage: An error occurred while adding the team image.
error_updateTeam: An error occurred while updating the team.
error_selectTeam: An error occurred when we tried to get the information about the current team.
error_joinTeam: An error occurred when we tried to let you join the team.
error_joinRequestTeam: An error occurred when we tried to find out who requested to join the team.
error_acceptRequest: An error occurred while accepting the request.
error_declineRequest: An error occurred while declining the request.
error_searchTeam: An error occurred while searching the team.
error_addTasting: An error occurred while adding tasting.
error_deleteTasting: An error occurred while deleting the tasting.
error_fetchNav: An error occurred when we tried to get the menu information.
error_searchContest: An error occurred when we tried get the information about the contest.
error_rejectContest: An error occurred while rejecting the request.
error_addUserContest: An error occurred while accepting the user.
